details:
verb
- to give a benediction to
= example: to give a benediction to
- to render holy by means of religious rites
= example: to render holy by means of religious rites
= synonyms: consecrate
- to make the sign of the cross over someone in order to call on God for protection
= example: to make the sign of the cross over someone in order to call on God for protection
= synonyms: sign
- to confer prosperity or happiness on
= example: to confer prosperity or happiness on
